page.title: 04GAMES CHILDREN PLAY
page.content: {HIDE & SEEK-}play near a lampost.See who is on it,he counts to 100 and we all hide,say "ready" and he finds us.the 1st one found is on it.{POM POM {IN}- like H&S but touch post and say where hidden.{MURDER BALL}-throw a ball at the others legs,then they are it.{COMPUTER WARRIOR}-we get sucked into a computer &have to fight monsters to get out. Its funny.{STUCK {IN THE MUD}-one person is on it & catches people,they hold out their arms,the others run under and they are free.{WEREWOLF}-one of us gets scratched by a werewolf.{PIRATE}MURDER -5 pirates 5 victims.Pirates have to catch and murder you,your friends try to kill the pirates.{SPACE}-I pretend I'm on a planet fighting aliens, its an adventure.{IT}& {CRICKET }are other games we play.We play all these in the playground and on the Green.
